abstract: Supreme Court rules chemical company M&G Polymers USA can cut health benefits of its retired union employees, reversing appeals court judgement.
lead_paragraph: The unanimous decision reversed a lower-court ruling that found the benefits had vested for life.
snippet: The unanimous decision reversed a lower-court ruling that found the benefits had vested for life.

headline.main: Supreme Court Rules Against Retirees in Union Health Benefits Case
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Rules Against Retirees in Union Health Benefits Case
